body_html:
@Zrachel hmm, weird. I rerun your script on my own build with NCCL distributed backend compiled in and it worked well. I don't understand why NCCL backend build would affect your code since you are using TCP backend and they should not affect each other due to entirely different code paths.

Could you try to pull the latest master and do a clean build? That's what I just did and it worked fine
